author: hwright
msg: Per HACKING, remove individual authorship designation.

author: malcolm
msg: FSFS: Remove a redundant file open at filesystem open time.
Arguably, this protected against trying to open a BDB filesystem as FSFS, or
some similar sillyness, but it's not worth slowing every legitimate client

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: In the C++ layer, remove temporary pool variables
Replace the usage of temporary pool variables with calls to requestPool.pool().

author: markphip
msg: (commits): Added SOC task for commit with multiple WC's
